mapper.select: SELECT NVL(MAX(LOAN_SEQ),0) FROM BOOK_DETAIL bd WHERE DETAIL_SEQ = (SELECT NVL(MAX(DETAIL_SEQ),0) FROM BOOK_DETAIL bd WHERE BOOK_SEQ = #{book_seq})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOOK_LOAN (LOAN_SEQ, LOAN_SDAY, LOAN_EDAY, LOAN_CHECK, MEMBER_SEQ) VALUES(LOAN_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, SYSDATE+7, 'N', #{seq})
INSERT INTO BOOK_DETAIL (DETAIL_SEQ, BOOK_SEQ, LOAN_SEQ, RESERVE_SEQ, DAMAGE_SEQ) VALUES(DETAIL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{book_seq}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(LOAN_SEQ), 1) FROM BOOK_LOAN), '', '')
INSERT INTO BOOK_RESERVATION (RESERVE_SEQ, RESERVE_DATE, RESERVE_PERIOD) VALUES(RESERVE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT LOAN_EDAY FROM BOOK_LOAN WHERE LOAN_SEQ = #{seq}), 7)
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK_DETAIL SET RESERVE_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(RESERVE_SEQ) FROM BOOK_RESERVATION) WHERE DETAIL_SEQ=(SELECT DETAIL_SEQ FROM BOOK_DETAIL WHERE LOAN_SEQ = #{seq})
mapper.select: SELECT LOAN_SEQ, LOAN_SDAY, LOAN_EDAY, LOAN_CHECK, MEMBER_SEQ FROM BOOK_LOAN WHERE LOAN_CHECK = 'N' AND MEMBER_SEQ = (SELECT MEMBER_SEQ FROM BOOK_MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id})
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOK_LOAN SET LOAN_CHECK = 'Y' WHERE LOAN_SEQ = (SELECT LOAN_SEQ FROM BOOK_DETAIL WHERE BOOK_SEQ = #{book_seq})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM BOOK WHERE BOOK_SEQ IN ( SELECT BOOK_SEQ FROM BOOK_DETAIL WHERE LOAN_SEQ IN ( SELECT LOAN_SEQ FROM BOOK_LOAN WHERE LOAN_CHECK = 'N' AND MEMBER_SEQ = (SELECT MEMBER_SEQ FROM BOOK_MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}) ) )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOOK b WHERE TITLE LIKE #{title} AND DELFLAG LIKE 'N'
SELECT NVL(MAX(BOOK_SEQ), 0) FROM BOOK b WHERE TITLE LIKE #{title} AND DELFLAG LIKE 'N' AND BOOK_SEQ NOT IN (SELECT BOOK_SEQ FROM BOOK_DETAIL)
